title: Create mini-landing page for project submissions
body_html:
Suggested by @carpodaster:

Right now we cannot link to /projects/new directly since it will probably redirect with a “Login required!!!11122". We could roll a “please register” mini landing page instead of a redirect, or maybe even an transparent overlay over the form so that people can already peek at what’s to come.
